public class GamingService
extends java.lang.Object
    service implementation for gaming rest api

        public GameResponse createGame(java.lang.String playerName)
        Method : createGame Service method to create a new game
        Parameters:
        playerName - name of the player
        Returns:
        - game response with message and game entity of newly created game.

        Method : listAllGames Service method to list all games
        Returns:
        - game response with message and game entities of all games.

                             java.lang.String playerName)
        Method : joinGame Service method to join an available game
        Parameters:
        id - id of the game
        playerName - name of the player
        Returns:
        - game response with message and game entity of active game.

      • performGameMove

        public GameResponse performGameMove(int id,

                                    java.lang.String move)
        Method : performGameMove Service method to perform a game move by a player
        Parameters:
        id - id of the game
        playerName - name of the player
        move - board position the player want to make a move to
        Returns:
        - game response with message and game entity of game.
